mapper.select: SELECT pcno, title, userid, discount, type, target, TO_CHAR(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as startDay, TO_CHAR(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as endDay, CASE WHEN type = 3 THEN (SELECT namekor FROM wine WHERE wno = target) ELSE NULL END as namekor , (SELECT nickname FROM wine_member WHERE promotion_coupon.userid=wine_member.userid) as nickName FROM promotion_coupon WHERE (sysdate BETWEEN startdate AND endDate) AND pcno NOT IN (SELECT pcno FROM my_coupon WHERE recvid=#{id}) AND state=1 ORDER BY discount DESC

SELECT pcno, title, userid, discount, type, target, TO_CHAR(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as startDay, TO_CHAR(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as endDay, CASE WHEN type = 3 THEN (SELECT namekor FROM wine WHERE wine.wno = target) ELSE NULL END as namekor, (SELECT nickname FROM wine_member WHERE promotion_coupon.userid=wine_member.userid) as nickName FROM promotion_coupon WHERE enddate>sysdate AND state=0 AND userid LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'

SELECT pcno, title, userid, discount, type, target, TO_CHAR(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as startDay, TO_CHAR(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as endDay, CASE WHEN type = 3 THEN (SELECT namekor FROM wine WHERE wine.wno = target) ELSE NULL END as namekor, (SELECT nickname FROM wine_member WHERE promotion_coupon.userid=wine_member.userid) as nickName FROM promotion_coupon WHERE state=1 AND userid LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%' AND sysdate BETWEEN startDate AND endDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_coupon VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(MCNO)+1, 1) FROM my_coupon), #{title}, #{pcno}, #{recvid}, #{discount}, #{pcid}, #{startDay}, #{endDay}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT MCNO, title, pcno, discount, pcid, TO_CHAR(startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as startDay, TO_CHAR(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as endDay, (SELECT target FROM promotion_coupon WHERE my_coupon.pcno=promotion_coupon.pcno) as target, (SELECT type FROM promotion_coupon WHERE my_coupon.pcno=promotion_coupon.pcno) as type, CASE WHEN (SELECT type FROM promotion_coupon WHERE my_coupon.pcno=promotion_coupon.pcno) = 3 THEN (SELECT namekor FROM wine WHERE wno = (SELECT target FROM promotion_coupon WHERE promotion_coupon.pcno = my_coupon.pcno)) ELSE NULL END as namekor , (SELECT nickname FROM wine_member WHERE pcid=wine_member.userid) as nickName FROM my_coupon WHERE recvid=#{id} AND state=0 ORDER BY MCNO ASC
